section.name: DBC_COD_ACTI
section.code: *<<<< DBC_COD_ACTI IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DBC-COD-ACTI IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO DBC-COD-ACTI IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-ACTI. *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' ) AND DBC-COD-ACTI IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-ACTI ELSE IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' OR 'CA' ) AND DBC-COD-ACTI IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-ACTI IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-ACTI. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DBC-COD-ACTI IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-ACTI IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-ACTI. *>>>>

section.name: DBC_COD_EJEC
section.code: *<<<< DBC_COD_EJEC *DAD ini 20-FEB-1995 IF SCR-CMND = 'MOD' GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-EJEC. *DAD fin 20-FEB-1995 *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' OR 'CA' ) AND DBC-COD-EJEC IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-EJEC ELSE IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' ) AND DBC-COD-EJEC IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-EJEC IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-EJEC. * IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND * DBC-COD-EJEC IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES * MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-EJEC IN DBP-FLD * GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-EJEC. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 *>>>>

section.name: DBC_COD_ODSE
section.code: *<<<< DBC_COD_ODSE *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' OR 'CA' ) AND DBC-COD-ODSE IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-ODSE ELSE IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' ) AND DBC-COD-ODSE IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-ODSE IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-ODSE. * IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND * DBC-COD-ODSE IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES * MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-ODSE IN DBP-FLD * GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-ODSE. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 *>>>>

section.name: DBC_COD_OFIC
section.code: *<<<< DBC_COD_OFIC *DAD ini 20-FEB-1995 IF SCR-CMND = 'MOD' GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-OFIC. *DAD fin 20-FEB-1995 *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' OR 'PV' OR 'CA' ) AND DBC-COD-OFIC IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-OFIC. * IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND * DBC-COD-OFIC IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES * MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-OFIC IN DBP-FLD * GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-OFIC. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 *>>>>

section.name: DBC_COD_TICL
section.code: *<<<< DBC_COD_TICL *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' OR 'PV' OR 'CA' OR 'EX' ) AND DBC-COD-TICL IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-TICL. * IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND * DBC-COD-TICL IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES * MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-TICL IN DBP-FLD * GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-TICL. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 *>>>>

section.name: DBC_GLS_APAT
section.code: *<<<< DBC_GLS_APAT IF DBC-GLS-APAT IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-INST = SCR-INST-GFL PERFORM ERR-GLS. *>>>>

section.name: DBC_GLS_NOMB
section.code: *<<<< DBC_GLS_NOMB IF DBC-GLS-NOMB IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-INST = SCR-INST-GFL PERFORM ERR-GLS. *>>>>

section.name: DBC_IND_OOFI
section.code: *<<<< DBC_IND_OOFI IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DBC-IND-OOFI IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO DBC-IND-OOFI IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-IND-OOFI. *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' ) AND DBC-IND-OOFI IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-IND-OOFI ELSE IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' OR 'CA' ) AND DBC-IND-OOFI IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-IND-OOFI. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DBC-IND-OOFI IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-IND-OOFI. *>>>>

section.name: DBC_NUM_DCOR
section.code: *<<<< DBC_NUM_DCOR *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 * IF DBC-NUM-DCOR-ATR IN DBP-FLD = FRM-CPIM-AEY IF FRM-IND-VERS IN DBP-FLD = 'N' GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-NUM-DCOR. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DBC-NUM-DCOR IN DBP-FLD NOT > ZEROS GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-NUM-DCOR. IF SCR-CCPP = 'MOD' OR ( SCR-CCPP = 'ACT' AND SCR-ACTU = SCR-ACTU-MOD ) MOVE DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO RCD-CAI-ICLI IN RCD MOVE DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO RCD-IIC-ICLI IN RCD MOVE DBC-NUM-DCOR IN DBP-FLD TO RCD-NUM-DIRE IN RCD MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SGC-FIO-RCD IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMDCORNEX ' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-NUM-DCOR. *>>>>

section.name: DBC_VRF_ICLI
section.code: *<<<< DBC_VRF_ICLI IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-MIC AND SCR-INST = SCR-INST-GFL PERFORM KEY-DBC-DBP MOVE 'DBC-IDC-ICLI' TO FIO-AKEY MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SGC-FIO-DBC IF FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'DBCIDCYAEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-VRF-ICLI. *>>>>

section.name: DCC_COD_RCHZ
section.code:
*<<<< DCC_COD_RCHZ *DAD ini 20-FEB-1995 IF SCR-CMND = 'MOD' GO TO FIN-VAL-DCC-COD-RCHZ. *DAD fin 20-FEB-1995 *LRH ini 18-MAY-1994 IF DCC-COD-RCHZ IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO DCC-COD-OFIR IN DBP-FLD.
MOVE 'SGC' TO FIO-SIST. MOVE 'RCC' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE DCC-COD-RCHZ IN DBP-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND. PERFORM GNS-FIO-TAB. IF NOT ( FIO-STAT-OKS AND TAB-MSC-STAT IN TAB = 'S' ) MOVE 'GNS' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'COD NEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-DCC-COD-RCHZ.
IF DCC-COD-RCHZ IN DBP-FLD > SPACES AND DCC-COD-OFIR IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE 'SGC' TO FIO-SIST MOVE 'VSN' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB MOVE 'OFIUSP DCC' TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM GNS-FIO-TAB IF FIO-STAT-OKS AND TAB-MSC-STAT IN TAB = 'S' MOVE SCR-OFI-USP IN SCR-VARI TO DCC-COD-OFIR IN DBP-FLD. *LRH fin 18-MAY-1994 *>>>>

section.name: DCP_COD_ACTS
section.code: *<<<< DCP_COD_ACTS IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DCP-COD-ACTS IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO DCP-COD-ACTS IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-ACTS. IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DCP-COD-ACTS IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-ACTS IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-ACTS. IF DCP-COD-ACTS IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-ACTS IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-ACTS. *>>>>

section.name: DCP_COD_CSEC
section.code: *<<<< DCP_COD_CSEC *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 * IF DCP-COD-CSEC-ATR IN DBP-FLD = FRM-CPIM-AEY IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DCP-COD-CSEC IN DBP-FLD NOT > ZEROS MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-CSEC IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-CSEC. IF FRM-IND-VERS IN DBP-FLD = 'N' GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-CSEC. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 *>>>>

section.name: DCP_COD_PNAC
section.code: *<<<< DCP_COD_PNAC *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DCP-COD-PNAC IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO DCP-COD-PNAC IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-PNAC. IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' ) AND DCP-COD-PNAC IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-PNAC ELSE IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' OR 'CO' OR 'CA' ) AND DCP-COD-PNAC IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-PNAC IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-PNAC. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DCP-COD-PNAC IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-PNAC IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-PNAC. MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'PAI' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE DCP-COD-PNAC IN DBP-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-COD. IF MSG-COD-MENS IN MSG NOT = 'COD NEX' AND DCP-COD-PNAC IN DBP-FLD > SPACES MOVE TAB TO PAI MOVE PAI-GLS-NACI IN PAI TO FRM-GLS-PNAC IN DBP-FLD ELSE MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-PNAC IN DBP-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: DCP_COD_PROF
section.code: *<<<< DCP_COD_PROF IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DCP-COD-PROF IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-PROF. *>>>>

section.name: DCP_COD_TBAN
section.code: *<<<< DCP_COD_TBAN * *DAD ini 20-FEB-1995 IF SCR-CMND = 'MOD' GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-TBAN. *DAD fin 20-FEB-1995 * IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES *ADA-INI JSS 27-MAR-2003 * MOVE SPACES TO DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD PERFORM ERR-GLS *ADA-FIN JSS 27-MAR-2003 GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-TBAN. * *DAD ini 26-AUG-1992 *LRH ini 26-ABR-1994 / 20-ABR-1994 * IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL') AND IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' ) AND *LRH fin 26-ABR-1994 / 20-ABR-1994 DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-TBAN. *DAD fin 26-AUG-1992 *>>>>

section.name: DCP_COD_TPLN
section.code: *<<<< DCP_COD_TPLN *DAD ini 18-FEB-1994 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' ) AND DCP-COD-TPLN IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-TPLN. *DAD fin 18-FEB-1994 *LRH ini 18-MAY-1994 IF WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' IF SCR-CMND = 'ING' OR SCR-ACTU = 'ING' PERFORM VAL-COD-TIPO-PLAN IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-TPLN ELSE NEXT SENTENCE ELSE IF SCR-CMND = 'MOD' OR SCR-ACTU = 'MOD' MOVE DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBC MOVE DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBC MOVE SPACES TO DBC-COD-OFIC IN DBC PERFORM BUS-OLD-CCT IF CCT-FIOP NOT < '19940404' PERFORM VAL-COD-TIPO-PLAN IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-COD-TPLN. *LRH fin 18-MAY-1994 *>>>>

section.name: DCP_IND_CASA
section.code: *<<<< DCP_IND_CASA IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DCP-IND-CASA IN DBP-FLD NOT > ZEROS GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-CASA. *>>>>

section.name: DCP_IND_ECIV
section.code: *<<<< DCP_IND_ECIV *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DCP-IND-ECIV IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO DCP-IND-ECIV IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-ECIV. IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' ) AND DCP-IND-ECIV IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-ECIV ELSE IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' OR 'CO' OR 'CA' ) AND DCP-IND-ECIV IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-ECIV. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DCP-IND-ECIV IN DBP-FLD NOT > ZEROS GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-ECIV. *>>>>

section.name: DCP_IND_NEDU
section.code: *<<<< DCP_IND_NEDU IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DCP-IND-NEDU IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-NEDU. *>>>>

section.name: DCP_IND_RCNY
section.code: *<<<< DCP_IND_RCNY IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DCP-IND-RCNY IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO DCP-IND-RCNY IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-RCNY. *DAD ini 26-AUG-1992 *AFRI-INI SEP-2015 CONVIVIENTE CIVIL * IF DCP-IND-ECIV IN DBP-FLD = 'CAS' AND IF (DCP-IND-ECIV IN DBP-FLD = WCC-CAS OR DCP-IND-ECIV IN DBP-FLD = WCC-CCV) AND *AFRI-INI SEP-2015 CONVIVIENTE CIVIL DCP-IND-RCNY IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-RCNY. *DAD fin 26-AUG-1992 *>>>>

section.name: DCP_IND_SEXO
section.code: *<<<< DCP_IND_SEXO *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' OR 'CA' ) AND DCP-IND-SEXO IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-SEXO ELSE IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' ) AND DCP-IND-SEXO IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-SEXO. * IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND * DCP-IND-SEXO IN DBP-FLD NOT > ZEROS * GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-SEXO. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 *>>>>

section.name: DCP_IND_SLAB
section.code: *<<<< DCP_IND_SLAB IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND DCP-IND-SLAB IN DBP-FLD NOT > ZEROS GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-SLAB. *>>>>

section.name: EOF
section.code:
*<<<< EOF *LRH ini 18-MAY-1994 VAL-COD-TIPO-PLAN SECTION. *LRH ini 18-OCT-1994 * MOVE 'SGC' TO TAB-COD-SIST MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST *LRH fin 18-OCT-1994 MOVE 'PLN' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB MOVE DCP-COD-TPLN IN DBP-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB PERFORM BUS-TAB IF MSG-COD-MENS > SPACES MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-COD-TIPO-PLAN ELSE MOVE TAB-GLS-DATA TO WSS-COD-PLAN IF WSS-COD-PLAX = 'X' MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'CODTPLNNOVAL' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-COD-TIPO-PLAN. FIN-VAL-COD-TIPO-PLAN. EXIT. *LRH fin 18-MAY-1994 *DAD ini 05-JUN-1992 CHK-NUM-FONO SECTION. INI-CHK-NUM-FONO. IF WSS-NUM-FONO IN WSS-VARI(WSS-IND) = SPACES IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'A' OR 'E' NEXT SENTENCE ELSE IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'B' OR 'D' MOVE 'E' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI ELSE * IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'C' MOVE 'X' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI ELSE IF WSS-NUM-FONO IN WSS-VARI(WSS-IND) = '-' IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'A' OR 'C' OR 'D' OR 'E' MOVE 'X' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI ELSE * IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'B' MOVE 'C' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI ELSE IF WSS-NUM-FONO IN WSS-VARI(WSS-IND) IS NUMERIC IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'A' MOVE 'B' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI ELSE IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'B' OR 'D' NEXT SENTENCE ELSE IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'C' MOVE 'D' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI ELSE * IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'E' MOVE 'X' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI ELSE MOVE 'X' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI. FIN-CHK-NUM-FONO. EXIT. *DAD fin 05-JUN-1992 ************************************************ PRO-NMSG-NOMB SECTION. INI-PRO-NMSG-NOMB. *DAD 26-FEB-1991 * Atencion Personalizada al Cliente * para Sistema Banca Telefonica IF MNP-GLS-NOMB IN DBP-FLD > SPACES MOVE MNP-GLS-NOMB IN DBP-FLD TO MNP-GLS-NOMB IN MNP MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SBT-FIO-MNP IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE MNP-GLS-NOMB IN DBP-FLD TO WSS-GLS-NOM2 PERFORM OBT-CIC ELSE MOVE MNP-NUM-NMSG IN MNP TO DCP-NUM-NMSG IN DBP-FLD ELSE IF DCP-NUM-NMSG IN DBP-FLD > ZEROES MOVE DCP-NUM-NMSG IN DBP-FLD TO MNP-NUM-NMSG IN MNP MOVE 'MNP-NUM-NMSG' TO FIO-AKEY MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SBT-FIO-MNP IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'SBT' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'MNPGETNOEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR ELSE MOVE MNP-GLS-NOMB IN MNP TO MNP-GLS-NOMB IN DBP-FLD. FIN-PRO-NMSG-NOMB. EXIT.
OBT-CIC SECTION. INI-OBT-CIC. * GET-CIC Obtener CIC MOVE 'NMNP' TO CIC-CAI-ICIC IN CIC MOVE CIC-GET TO CIC-CMND PERFORM PRO-CIC IF CIC-STAT NOT = CIC-STAT-OKS MOVE 'GNS' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE CIC-MENS TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR ELSE MOVE CIC-NUM-ICIC TO DCP-NUM-NMSG IN DBP-FLD MOVE WSS-GLS-NOM2 TO MNP-GLS-NOMB IN DBP-FLD PERFORM ACT-MNP. IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'ERRACT MNP' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. FIN-OBT-CIC. EXIT.
*AVM 12-JUN-1990 17:00 Hrs. ACT-MNP SECTION. INI-ACT-MNP. MOVE MNP-GLS-NOMB IN DBP-FLD TO MNP-GLS-NOMB IN MNP. MOVE FIO-GET-KEY-UPD TO FIO-CMND. PERFORM SBT-FIO-MNP. IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS PERFORM GET-FHOY MOVE HOY-DHOY IN HOY-VARI TO MNP-NUM-DACT IN MNP MOVE HOY-MHOY IN HOY-VARI TO MNP-NUM-MACT IN MNP MOVE HOY-AHOY IN HOY-VARI TO MNP-NUM-AACT IN MNP MOVE HOY-SHOY IN HOY-VARI TO MNP-NUM-SACT IN MNP MOVE DCP-NUM-NMSG IN DBP-FLD TO MNP-NUM-NMSG IN MNP MOVE FIO-PUT TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SBT-FIO-MNP IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'SBT' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'MNPPUTNOK' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR ELSE NEXT SENTENCE ELSE PERFORM GET-FHOY MOVE HOY-DHOY IN HOY-VARI TO MNP-NUM-DACT IN MNP MOVE HOY-MHOY IN HOY-VARI TO MNP-NUM-MACT IN MNP MOVE HOY-AHOY IN HOY-VARI TO MNP-NUM-AACT IN MNP MOVE HOY-SHOY IN HOY-VARI TO MNP-NUM-SACT IN MNP MOVE DCP-NUM-NMSG IN DBP-FLD TO MNP-NUM-NMSG IN MNP MOVE FIO-MOD TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SBT-FIO-MNP IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'SBT' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'MNPMODNOK' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. FIN-ACT-MNP. EXIT. ********************************************************* *>>>>

section.name: FIN_CLR_FLD_DBP
section.code: *<<<< FIN_CLR_FLD_DBP *MHM-INI 15-FEB-2007 IF SCR-NEMO = 'SGCACTDPX3.1' MOVE 'PV' TO DBC-COD-TICL IN DBP-FLD MOVE '090' TO DBC-COD-OFIC IN DBP-FLD MOVE 'SIN' TO DCP-IND-NEDU IN DBP-FLD. *MHM-FIN 15-FEB-2007 *>>>>

section.name: FIN_DBC_COD_TICL
section.code:
*<<<< FIN_DBC_COD_TICL * *INI-ADA 02-MAY-2002. * agregan validacion de banca, segun BCI-Corp. *----------------------------------------------* IF SCR-CMND NOT = 'MOD' GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-TICL. * IF WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-TICL. * MOVE DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD TO WSS-GLS-TBA1 IN WSS-VARI. MOVE DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD TO WSS-GLS-TBA2 IN WSS-VARI. section.name: FIN_DCP_IND_ECIV
section.code:
*<<<< FIN_DCP_IND_ECIV *AFRI-INI SEP-2015 CONVIVIENTE CIVIL IF MSG-COD-MENS = 'COD NEX' MOVE ZEROES TO WSS-NUM-EDAL MOVE SPACES TO WSS-GLS-RPER ELSE MOVE MSC-GLS-DATA IN MSC(11:3) TO WSS-NUM-EDAL MOVE MSC-GLS-DAT1 IN MSC TO WSS-GLS-RPER.
IF WSS-NUM-EDAL IN WSS-VARI NOT > ZEROES OR WSS-NUM-EDAL IN WSS-VARI IS NOT NUMERIC GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-ECIV.
*CALCULA EDAD MINIMA SEGUN ESTADO CIVIL PERFORM CAL-EDAD-CLI. IF WSS-NUM-EDAD IN WSS-VARI < WSS-NUM-EDAL IN WSS-VARI MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'EDAD INVAL' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-ECIV. *AFRI-FIN SEP-2015 CONVIVIENTE CIVIL
*>>>>

section.name: FIN_DCP_IND_RCNY
section.code:
*<<<< FIN_DCP_IND_RCNY
*AFRI-INI SEP-2015 CONVIVIENTE CIVIL IF WSS-GLS-RPER IN WSS-VARI NOT > SPACES AND DCP-IND-RCNY IN DBP-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'RCNY INCOS' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-RCNY.
IF WSS-GLS-RPER IN WSS-VARI NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-RCNY.
PERFORM VAR-RCNY-VAL. IF WSS-IND-RCNV IN WSS-VARI NOT = WCC-S MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'RCNY INVAL' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-IND-RCNY.
*AFRI-FIN SEP-2015 CONVIVIENTE CIVIL *>>>>

section.name: FIN_PUT_ALL_DBP
section.code: *<<<< FIN_PUT_ALL_DBP *AVM 13-JUN-1990 11:30 Hrs. IF DCP-NUM-NMSG IN DBP-FLD > ZEROES MOVE DCP-NUM-NMSG IN DBP-FLD TO MNP-NUM-NMSG IN MNP MOVE 'MNP-NUM-NMSG' TO FIO-AKEY MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SBT-FIO-MNP IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE SPACES TO MNP-GLS-NOMB IN DBP-FLD ELSE MOVE MNP-GLS-NOMB IN MNP TO MNP-GLS-NOMB IN DBP-FLD. * IF RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBP-FLD > SPACES * MOVE RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBP-FLD TO WSS-COD-LUGA * IF WSS-IND-PAIS = 'P' * MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST * MOVE 'PAI' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB * MOVE WSS-COD-PAIS TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB * PERFORM BUS-TAB * MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-LUGA IN DBP-FLD * ELSE * MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST * MOVE 'COM' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB * MOVE RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBP-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB * PERFORM BUS-TAB * MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-LUGA IN DBP-FLD. MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'PAI' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE DCP-COD-PNAC IN DBP-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM BUS-TAB. IF TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-PNAC IN DBP-FLD ELSE MOVE TAB TO PAI MOVE PAI-GLS-NACI IN PAI TO FRM-GLS-PNAC IN DBP-FLD. GET-FRM-IND-ERCC. MOVE SPACES TO REC-KEY-IREC IN REC. MOVE DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO REC-CAI-ICLI IN REC. MOVE DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO REC-IIC-ICLI IN REC. MOVE FIO-GET-NLS TO FIO-CMND. LUP-GET-FRM-IND-ERCC. PERFORM SGC-FIO-REC. IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'N' TO FRM-IND-ERCC IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-GET-FRM-IND-ERCC. IF REC-CAI-ICLI IN REC = DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBP-FLD AND REC-IIC-ICLI IN REC = DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBP-FLD IF REC-IND-VIGE IN REC = 'N' OR REC-COD-TREC IN REC = REC-COD-RBCO MOVE FIO-GET-NXT TO FIO-CMND GO TO LUP-GET-FRM-IND-ERCC ELSE MOVE 'S' TO FRM-IND-ERCC IN DBP-FLD ELSE MOVE 'N' TO FRM-IND-ERCC IN DBP-FLD. FIN-GET-FRM-IND-ERCC. EXIT. GET-FRM-GLS-RBCO. PERFORM BUS-PPU. IF MSG-COD-MENS > SPACES MOVE MSG-GLS-DCOR TO FRM-GLS-RBCO IN DBP-FLD ELSE PERFORM CIC-PPU IF MSG-COD-MENS > SPACES MOVE MSG-GLS-DCOR TO FRM-GLS-RBCO IN DBP-FLD ELSE MOVE DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO PPU-CAI-ICLI MOVE DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO PPU-IIC-ICLI PERFORM BUS-RCU MOVE TAB-GLS-DCOR IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-RBCO IN DBP-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: INI_DCP_VRF_CIDE
section.code:
*<<<< INI_DCP_VRF_CIDE
IF DCP-VRF-CIDE IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO DCP-VRF-CIDE IN DBP-FLD. *VAL-VRF Valida Verificador MOVE VRF-VAL TO VRF-CMND. MOVE VRF-SVRF-K TO VRF-SVRF. MOVE VRF-ZERO-S TO VRF-ZERO. MOVE DCP-NUM-CIDE IN DBP-FLD TO VRF-NUME. MOVE DCP-VRF-CIDE IN DBP-FLD TO VRF-DVRF. MOVE 7 TO VRF-LMAX. IF DCP-NUM-CIDE IN DBP-FLD NOT > ZEROES AND DBC-IND-ICLI IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES AND DBC-GLS-ICLI IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE DBC-NUM-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO DCP-NUM-CIDE IN DBP-FLD MOVE DBC-VRF-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO DCP-VRF-CIDE IN DBP-FLD. GO TO FIN-VAL-DCP-VRF-CIDE.. *>>>>

section.name: INI_KEY_DBC_DBP
section.code:
*<<<< INI_KEY_DBC_DBP MOVE DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBC. MOVE DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBC.
* VNA-INI : MODIFICACIONES PARA INGRESADAS PARA NOVA
IF NOT ( WSS-INST-BCS = 'GFL' AND ( SCR-CCPP = 'MOD' OR SCR-CMND = 'MNC' ) ) MOVE DBC-GLS-APAT IN DBP-FLD TO DBC-GLS-APAT IN DBC ELSE IF NOT ( SCR-OFRM-SRV AND SCR-HDR-MRCA = 'BCS' AND * MPS-INI Nueva Banca MicroEmpresarios 30/06/2015 * DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = 'PBM' AND (DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = PGM-PBM OR DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = PGM-PMV) AND * MPS-FIN Nueva Banca MicroEmpresarios 30/06/2015 ( SCR-CCPP ='MOD' OR SCR-CMND ='MNC') AND DBC-GLS-APAT IN DBC > SPACES )
MOVE DBC-GLS-APAT IN DBP-FLD TO DBC-GLS-APAT IN DBC.
* VNA-INI : MODIFICACIONES PARA INGRESADAS PARA NOVA
IF NOT ( WSS-INST-BCS = 'GFL' AND ( SCR-CCPP = 'MOD' OR SCR-CMND = 'MNC' ) ) MOVE DBC-GLS-AMAT IN DBP-FLD TO DBC-GLS-AMAT IN DBC ELSE IF NOT ( SCR-OFRM-SRV AND SCR-HDR-MRCA = 'BCS' AND * MPS-INI Nueva Banca MicroEmpresarios 30/06/2015 * DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = 'PBM' AND (DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = PGM-PBM OR DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = PGM-PMV) AND * MPS-FIN Nueva Banca MicroEmpresarios 30/06/2015 ( SCR-CCPP ='MOD' OR SCR-CMND ='MNC') AND DBC-GLS-AMAT IN DBC > SPACES ) MOVE DBC-GLS-AMAT IN DBP-FLD TO DBC-GLS-AMAT IN DBC.
* VNA-INI : MODIFICACIONES PARA INGRESADAS PARA NOVA
IF NOT ( WSS-INST-BCS = 'GFL' AND ( SCR-CCPP = 'MOD' OR SCR-CMND = 'MNC' ) ) MOVE DBC-GLS-NOMB IN DBP-FLD TO DBC-GLS-NOMB IN DBC ELSE IF NOT ( SCR-OFRM-SRV AND SCR-HDR-MRCA = 'BCS' AND * MPS-INI Nueva Banca MicroEmpresarios 30/06/2015 * DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = 'PBM' AND (DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = PGM-PBM OR DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = PGM-PMV) AND * MPS-FIN Nueva Banca MicroEmpresarios 30/06/2015 ( SCR-CCPP ='MOD' OR SCR-CMND ='MNC') AND DBC-GLS-NOMB IN DBC > SPACES ) MOVE DBC-GLS-NOMB IN DBP-FLD TO DBC-GLS-NOMB IN DBC.
MOVE DBC-NUM-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO DBC-NUM-ICLI IN DBC. MOVE DBC-VRF-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO DBC-VRF-ICLI IN DBC. MOVE DBC-IND-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO DBC-IND-ICLI IN DBC. MOVE DBC-GLS-ICLI IN DBP-FLD TO DBC-GLS-ICLI IN DBC. GO TO FIN-KEY-DBC-DBP. *>>>>

section.code: *<<<< INI_PUT_DBC_DBP AND (PGM_CHI OR PGM_ARG) *DAD ini 26-JUN-1992 MOVE 'SGC' TO FIO-SIST. MOVE 'VSN' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE 'DBCDCOR DBP' TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. section.code:
*<<<< INI_RET_RCD_DBP IF NOT ( SCR-OFRM-SRV AND SCR-HDR-MRCA = 'BCS' AND * MPS-INI Nueva Banca MicroEmpresarios 30/06/2015 * DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = 'PBM' AND (DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = PGM-PBM OR DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = PGM-PMV) AND * MPS-FIN Nueva Banca MicroEmpresarios 30/06/2015 SCR-CCPP ='MOD' AND RCD-GLS-DIRE IN RCD > SPACES ) MOVE RCD-GLS-DIRE IN DBP-FLD TO RCD-GLS-DIRE IN RCD.
IF NOT ( SCR-OFRM-SRV AND SCR-HDR-MRCA = 'BCS' AND * MPS-INI Nueva Banca MicroEmpresarios 30/06/2015 * DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = 'PBM' AND (DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = PGM-PBM OR DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = PGM-PMV) AND * MPS-FIN Nueva Banca MicroEmpresarios 30/06/2015 SCR-CCPP ='MOD' AND RCD-COD-LUGA IN RCD > SPACES ) MOVE RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBP-FLD TO RCD-COD-LUGA IN RCD.
IF NOT ( SCR-OFRM-SRV AND SCR-HDR-MRCA = 'BCS' AND * MPS-INI Nueva Banca MicroEmpresarios 30/06/2015 * DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = 'PBM' AND (DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = PGM-PBM OR DCP-COD-TBAN IN DBP-FLD NOT = PGM-PMV) AND * MPS-FIN Nueva Banca MicroEmpresarios 30/06/2015 SCR-CCPP ='MOD' AND RCD-GLS-FONO IN RCD > SPACES ) MOVE RCD-GLS-FONO IN DBP-FLD TO RCD-GLS-FONO IN RCD. GO TO FIN-RET-RCD-DBP. *>>>>

section.name: INI_UNP_KEY_DBP
section.code: *<<<< INI_UNP_KEY_DBP *LRH ini 14-NOV-1994 IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD PERFORM PRO-KEY-DBP GO TO FIN-UNP-KEY-DBP. *LRH fin 14-NOV-1994 *>>>>

section.name: INI_VAL_CON_KEY_DBP
section.code: *<<<< INI_VAL_CON_KEY_DBP IF FRM-FFLD = FRM-FFLD-PF7 OR FRM-FFLD-PF8 GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-KEY-DBP. *>>>>

section.name: INI_VAL_FLD_DBP
section.code:
*<<<< INI_VAL_FLD_DBP *Este label al 15-NOV-1989 no existia, por lo que se debe * incorporar al *SGCBMDBP.SRCAIU *DAD IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-MNC GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBP. * IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-MIC PERFORM VAL-IKY-DBP GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBP. * IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-INC OR DBC-IND-ICLI IN DBP-FLD = 'A' PERFORM VAL-MKY-DBP IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-INC IF DBC-COD-OFIC IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS MOVE -1 TO DBC-COD-OFIC-LEN IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBP ELSE PERFORM VAL-DBC-COD-OFIC IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO DBC-COD-OFIC-LEN IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBP ELSE GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBP ELSE GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBP.
*DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 MOVE 'SGC' TO FIO-SIST. MOVE 'TCL' TO TAB-COD-TTAB. MOVE DBC-COD-TICL IN DBP-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND. PERFORM GNS-FIO-TAB. IF FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE TAB-CIC-CTAB IN TAB TO WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI ELSE MOVE SPACES TO WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 * *LRH ini 20-ABR-1994 IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-MVA PERFORM VAL-DCP-COD-TBAN IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO DCP-COD-TBAN-LEN IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBP. *LRH ini 18-MAY-1994 * ELSE * GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBP. IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-MVA PERFORM VAL-DCC-COD-RCHZ IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO DCC-COD-RCHZ-LEN IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBP. *LRH ini 17-NOV-1994 * ELSE * GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBP. IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-MVA PERFORM VAL-DBC-COD-EJEC IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO DBC-COD-EJEC-LEN IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBP. IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-MVA PERFORM VAL-DBC-COD-OFIC IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO DBC-COD-OFIC-LEN IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBP ELSE GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBP. *LRH fin 17-NOV-1994 *LRH fin 18-MAY-1994 *LRH fin 20-ABR-1994 *>>>>

section.name: INI_VAL_MKY_DBP
section.code: *<<<< INI_VAL_MKY_DBP AND PGM_BU PERFORM VAL-DBC-GLS-APAT. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO DBC-GLS-APAT-LEN IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-MKY-DBP. PERFORM VAL-DBC-GLS-AMAT. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO DBC-GLS-AMAT-LEN IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-MKY-DBP. PERFORM VAL-DBC-GLS-NOMB. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO DBC-GLS-NOMB-LEN IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-MKY-DBP. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_BU
section.code: *<<<< INI_VAL_MKY_DBP AND PGM_BU PERFORM VAL-DBC-GLS-APAT. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO DBC-GLS-APAT-LEN IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-MKY-DBP. PERFORM VAL-DBC-GLS-AMAT. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO DBC-GLS-AMAT-LEN IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-MKY-DBP. PERFORM VAL-DBC-GLS-NOMB. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO DBC-GLS-NOMB-LEN IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-MKY-DBP. *>>>>

section.name: RCD_COD_LUGA
section.code:
*<<<< RCD_COD_LUGA *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' OR ' ' ) AND RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-LUGA IN DBP-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-RCD-COD-LUGA.
IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' OR 'CA' ) AND RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-RCD-COD-LUGA. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 *DAD ini 09-FEB-1994 * MOVE RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBP-FLD TO WSS-COD-LUGA. * IF WSS-IND-PAIS = 'P' * MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST * MOVE 'PAI' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB * MOVE WSS-COD-PAIS TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB * PERFORM VAL-COD * IF MSG-COD-MENS IN MSG NOT = 'COD NEX' AND * RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBP-FLD > SPACES * MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-LUGA IN DBP-FLD * ELSE * MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-LUGA IN DBP-FLD * ELSE * MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST * MOVE 'COM' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB * MOVE RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBP-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB * PERFORM VAL-COD * IF MSG-COD-MENS IN MSG NOT = 'COD NEX' AND * RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBP-FLD > SPACES * MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-LUGA IN DBP-FLD * ELSE * MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-LUGA IN DBP-FLD. *DAD fin 09-FEB-1994 *>>>>

section.name: RCD_GLS_DIRE
section.code: *<<<< RCD_GLS_DIRE *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' OR ' ' ) AND RCD-GLS-DIRE IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-RCD-GLS-DIRE. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 IF RCD-GLS-DIRE IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS. *>>>>

section.name: RCD_GLS_FONO
section.code: *<<<< RCD_GLS_FONO *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' OR 'CA' ) AND RCD-GLS-FONO IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-RCD-GLS-FONO. * IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-ICD AND * RCD-GLS-FONO IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES * GO TO FIN-VAL-RCD-GLS-FONO. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 *DAD ini 05-JUN-1992 MOVE 'A' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI. IF RCD-GLS-FONO IN DBP-FLD NOT NUMERIC MOVE RCD-GLS-FONO IN DBP-FLD TO WSS-GLS-FONO IN WSS-VARI PERFORM CHK-NUM-FONO VARYING WSS-IND FROM 1 BY 1 UNTIL WSS-IND > 12 OR WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'X'. IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'X' OR 'C' MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMFONOERROR' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCD-GLS-FONO. *DAD fin 05-JUN-1992 *>>>>

section.name: VAL_CON_FLD_DBP
section.code: *<<<< VAL_CON_FLD_DBP *DAD ini 26-FEB-1991 IF SCR-CMND = WSS-CMND-DBP-MNC PERFORM PRO-NMSG-NOMB GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-DBP. *DAD fin 26-FEB-1991 IF DCP-COD-ACTS IN DBP-FLD > SPACES AND DCP-COD-ACTS IN DBP-FLD = DBC-COD-ACTI IN DBP-FLD MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'CODACTSERR' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-DBP. *AVM 12-JUN-1990 18:00 Hrs * IF ( ( DCP-NUM-CIDE IN DBP-FLD NOT > ZEROES OR * DCP-VRF-CIDE IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES ) AND * DCP-GLS-GABI IN DBP-FLD > SPACES ) OR * ( ( DCP-NUM-CIDE IN DBP-FLD > ZEROES OR * DCP-VRF-CIDE IN DBP-FLD > SPACES ) AND * DCP-GLS-GABI IN DBP-FLD NOT > SPACES ) * MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST * MOVE 'CONCIDEGABI' TO MSG-COD-MENS * PERFORM GET-MSG * MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS * MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. *JCT-INI 18-MAR-2009 SGC: NUB.2146:VALIDA EJE-OFI-BAN IF SCR-CMND = 'MVA' PERFORM VAL-CON-CEOB IF MSG-COD-MENS > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-DBP. *JCT-FIN 18-MAR-2009 *>>>>
